about_the_game:
Ahmaykmewsik made this soundtrack. It contains all of the music in MetaWare High School (Demo).

There are 25 tracks. The soundtrack is 74 minutes long.

The music was produced in Logic Pro.

It is advised you play the entire game before listening to the soundtrack. There might be spoilers!
Or not, if that's how you roll. It's not any of my business what you do with your time.
